The '''Travellers''' was the name in [[the Shire]] for the four [[Hobbits]] who travelled with the [[Fellowship of the Ring|Company of the Ring]]: [[Frodo Baggins]], [[Samwise Gamgee]], [[Peregrin Took]] and [[Meriadoc Brandybuck]].<ref>{{RK|VI9}}</ref>
